page.title: 13 RECREATION
page.content: 2.Gorebridge Bowling Club An active bowling and social club is to be found in the centre of the village.Some of the bowling members have represented Scotland in international matches and their season runs from early May until October.Facilities include a gamesroom,lounge-bar and a hall and this year the club celebrated their centenery. Regular functions include dances,shows and fund raising event. 3.Gorebridge Burns Club The club have their own lounge bar .They promote the language and poetry of Burns and annually organise a spoken verse competition in the local schools .A visit for P.7 pupils to Burns country is usually organised in the summer term of the school.
